MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L11 postcode area of Liverpool affecting properties in Storrington Avenue, Willowmeade and surrounding area. Restoration is taking longer than expected because of extensive repairs required on an underground cable fault at the corner of Storrington and Rose Bailey Close. Our engineers have attempted to restore supplies via alternative methods which have not been successful and our team are now working on a full repair to the cable and to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:45am on 19th March 2021.
